channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Consumers cut spending on cars and restaurants as tariffs kicked in. Trade wars weigh on economy.
item.description: Americans have become more careful about how much they spend because of tariffs and a slower U.S. economy.

item.title: Nike’s stock is headed for a ‘swoosh’-shaped recovery after years of pain, analyst says
item.description: Nike has endured a tough few years marked by weaker demand and its own struggles to adapt to shifting trends. While the athletic-gear and sneaker make...

item.title: Boeing is making a positive turn, says analyst upgrading stock to buy
item.description: Troubled aircraft maker Boeing was given an upgrade by an analyst who said a turnaround effort will get the market to reassess the stock.

item.title: My wife and I have $7,000 in pensions, $140,000 cash, plus $3,500 in Social Security. Can we afford to retire?
item.description: “My wife of 20 years is a Japanese national and lives in the U.S. as a permanent resident.”

item.title: I’ve been a stay-at-home mom for 10 years. Do I take a part-time job to spend more time with my kids or get a job for six figures?
item.description: “So much of my head has been filled with thoughts of needing to be the best, the brightest, the wealthiest.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
